MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:09am. Our engineers have arrived at the Westbank Clinic substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:17am on Friday, 30 October 2020
